comment: Great teacher, really cares about his students succeeding. Nice and very friendly

My favorite professor at KSU. Gets all students involved and makes class so that everyone WANTS to show up! He is hilarious! This has been, by far, my favorite class! There aren't a lot of grades but you do lots of activities. He isn't a harsh grader. He cares about his students and their success. There are no tests but there's a big presentation.
